alert.note: Alert for Big Stone; Traverse (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 06 at 2:52AM CDT until October 07 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures in the 20s expected. * WHERE...Portions of west central Minnesota and central, north central and northeast South Dakota. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
